sentences.sContent: He wanted to do a worthwhile job.
We decided to give the money to a worthwhile cause (= one that helps people ) .
sentences.sCn: 我们决定把这笔钱投入到慈善事业中。

sentences.sContent: ...He took a 30% salary cut but felt it worthwhile for the greater intellectual opportunities...

remMethod.val: worth(值得) ＋ while(时间) → 值得花时间的

words.tran: 值得的；有价值的；配得上的，相称的；可尊敬的；应…的

trans.tranCn: 值得花时间的， 值得做的
trans.tranOther: if something is worthwhile, it is important or useful, or you gain something from it
